programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato tests the new 911 Turbo, Vicki Butler-Henderson presents a high speed crash test, and Tom Ford drives a new Lamborghini.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw tackles the horrible subject of car tax. Jason Plato meets Moto GP star James Toseland in another feature where Fifth Gear makes a sports stars dream come true. Tom Ford demonstrates the potential safety issues of convertibles.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell tests a comprehensive selection of the latest hot hatches including the new and long-awaited Ford Focus RS. He rules out the MGZR, the Mini Cooper S and the Renault Clio Cup.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford spends the day with the scourge of modern day motorists - wheel clampers. Vicki Butler-Henderson tests the latest version of one of the greatest coupes of our time, the Nissan 350Z.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson learns how to become a spy photographer as she goes undercover trying to snap car manufacturer's secret prototypes. Tom Ford is in Japan driving the car of the future.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: We find out what happens if you accidentally put diesel into a petrol engine, and follow Tiff Needell as he races an Aston Martin DBR9S.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki is at the controls in a classic Ford v Vauxhall battle, two boy racer specials, the Fiesta ST and Corsa SRi, wage war to find out which is fastest. Tom journeys to the Arctic Circle to test the Volvo XC70, an estate car with four wheel drive.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell test drives the new Aston Martin V8 Vantage, billed as the most desirable sportscar in the world. Jon Bentley reveals definitively whether expensive petrol is worth the extra cash.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear gets unprecedented access behind the scenes of the multi-million pound Renault Formula 1 team, and the unique competition they recently held to find an engineer of the future.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is in Anglesey for another Fifth Gear shoot-out. This week it's the Porsche Cayenne GTS against the BMW X5. Tom Ford drives the new C5 and Tiff Needell tests the new Subaru Impreza STi.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Tom Ford test the new Citroen C6 by recreating the President de Gaulle assassination attempt with professional gunmen.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato helps a lottery winner choose a new supercar, Tiff Needell road tests the new Jaguar XK on the best road in the world, and Tom Ford meets Jenson Button at the Geneva Motorshow.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this edition of we're literally taking Fifth Gear to new heights and celebrating the most spectacular challenge petrol-heads have ever invented.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear Quentin Willson and Tiff Needell stage a massive head-on collision by piloting two remote controlled cars into each other at 60 mph.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford takes puts the Grande Punto Abarth through its hot hatch paces. Tim Shaw finds out if it's possible to save huge amounts of money by servicing your car yourself. Bruno Senna joins the programme as a special guest presenter.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason & Tiff battle against each other in the purest form of motor-sport: karting. Dirk Benedict joins Jonny Smith in a luxury road test. Tom Ford tests the Renault Laguna - it's rear wheels steer like magic but is it as good as the Mondeo?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw tackles the horrible subject of car tax. Jason Plato meets Moto GP star James Toseland in another feature where Fifth Gear makes a sports stars dream come true. Tom Ford demonstrates the potential safety issues of convertibles.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato pitches a lunatic Honda Civic Mugen RR imported from Japan against a Honda S2000 sports car from the UK. Jonny Smith tests the VW Passat CC v Mercedes CLS. Tiff Needell takes to the track to test the brand new KTM X-Bow.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato is given his toughest mission yet - to do one month's motoring in 24 hours. It's in a bid to give the new BMW 3 Series the ultimate road test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: To celebrate 20 years of Fifth Gear, Jason Plato and Vicki Butler-Henderson get behind the wheel of some of the best cars to feature on the show 20 years ago and put them up against their modern alternatives.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson and Tiff Needell travel to Romania to sample some of the car culture there. This includes driving some massive off-roaders, meeting a local classic car restorer, and racing a motorsport mad Mayor up the streets of his town.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Test-driving the Porsche 911 Carrera S; the crew sets out to break a world record.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff conducts a crash test to show why everyone should make sure their next car has electronic stability control. Vicki is at a motor show in Monte Carlo, where she reveals the latest Pagani hypercar and test drives the controversial Fisker Karma.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith is at the biggest American car show in the world - which takes place just outside a small town in Sweden. He judges the prestigious best in show competition, goes on a late night cruise and tests the brand new Corvette Grand Sport.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato looks at some of the ultimate attention grabbers that have been tested on Fifth Gear over the past two decades

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell is at the wheel of Lamborghini's awe-inspiring new Aventador hypercar, Vicki burns through Italy's snowy mountain roads in Mini's brand new Coupe, the team test the latest Porsche.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith goes behind-the-scenes at America's biggest motor race, the Indy 500. He hears what makes the event so special from triple winner Dario Franchitti, reveals the technical differences between F1 cars and Indy cars

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato and Tiff Needell pit three petrolhead icons against brand new, mainstream cars to find out if the classics we lust after are now outclassed by modern machines.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Vicki Butler-Henderson visit Poland to sample some of the sights, sounds and car culture there. Tiff competes in the final stage of the Barborka Rally, that takes place on the icy streets of Warsaw as night falls.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out if the new Fiat Panda 100HP is as quick as a Ferrari round a track, Jason Plato tries to crack 200mph on the public road in the £230,000 Brabus Rocket.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson, Adrian Simpson and Tom Ford visit the Paris motor show. They look at many of the new models revealed there including the Porsche Cayenne and Bentley Continental GT.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: An exclusive insight into America's most glamorous supercar club, based in an underground bunker at a private jet airport, Tiff Needell and Jason Plato race the BMW M3 against the Audi RS4.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson risks life and limb in the most dangerous car stunt of all - driving a car under a moving lorry. Jonny Smith tests the new Mercedes C Class and its revolutionary seat design.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson makes an unprecedented attempt to hit 200mph in an A1 Grand Prix car. Tom Ford and Jonny Smith take the seven newest hot hatches on sale and decide which is best.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason & Tiff pit the new Ford Focus RS against Mitsubishi Evo X. Audi's new Lamborghini engined supercar, the R8 V10, is under scrutiny. Tom Ford examines the brand new Citroen C3 Picasso from the point of view of a truly 21st Century family man.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom gets an advance look at Formula 1 supremo Bernie Ecclestone's rare and unusual collection of cars. Tiff and Jason take the BMW M3 and the Mercedes C63 AMG to a circuit to determine which is most deserving of its £50,000 price tag.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki tests two cars that are low, light and very fast - Lotus Exige S v Caterham CSR. Tom visits Spain to drive the Toyota Landcruiser. Jason Plato drives the Mercedes CLK63 Black. Tiff teaches Heston Blumenthal the art of powersliding.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell tests he BMW M5, by driving from the UK to the famous Pau circuit in the South of France. Tom Ford tests the world's maddest car - the Ariel Atom.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell poses the question, "What's the best GT car you can buy for £90,000?" He tests the top contenders which both come from Stuttgart - the Mercedes SL55 AMG and the Porsche 911 Turbo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff tests this grand tourer's handling through the dramatic scenery of Snowdonia in Wales. Jason Plato tests the brand new £115,000 Aston Martin DB9 Volante, one of the fastest cabriolets on sale today.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato helps a lottery winner choose a new supercar, Tiff Needell road tests the new Jaguar XK on the best road in the world, and Tom Ford meets Jenson Button at the Geneva Motorshow.
